!--------------------------- Getting Template for Defect fields------------------------------------------ :SET &VARA_OBJ_DEFECT_FIELDS# = "PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PRV.VARA.DEFECTS_FIELDS"
:SET &UC4RB_HPQC_DESCRIPTION# = "Test Set : &UC4RB_HPQC_TESTSET_NAME# failed under folder path &UC4RB_HPQC_TESTSET_FOLDER_PATH#. Please check the attachment for more details." :SET &UC4RB_HPQC_SUMMARY# = "Test Set &UC4RB_HPQC_TESTSET_NAME# failed under folder path &UC4RB_HPQC_TESTSET_FOLDER_PATH# " :SET &DATE# = SYS_DATE("YYYY-MM-DD") :SET &UC4RB_HPQC_SEVERITY# = GET_VAR(&VARA_OBJ_DEFECT_FIELDS#, "severity")
:DEFINE &UC4RB_HPQC_FIELD_NAMES#, string, 100 :DEFINE &UC4RB_HPQC_FIELD_VALUES#, string, 100 :DEFINE &IDX#, unsigned :SET &IDX# =1
:SET &HND#=PREP_PROCESS_VAR(&VARA_OBJ_DEFECT_FIELDS#) :PROCESS &HND# : SET &VK# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &VALUE#=GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2) : IF &VK# = "detected-by" : SET &VALUE# = &UC4RB_HPQC_USERNAME# : ENDIF : IF &VK# = "creation-time" : SET &VALUE# = &DATE# : ENDIF : IF &VK# = "severity" : SET &VALUE# = &UC4RB_HPQC_SEVERITY# : ENDIF : IF &VK# = "name" : SET &VALUE# = &UC4RB_HPQC_SUMMARY# : ENDIF : IF &VK# = "description" : SET &VALUE# = &UC4RB_HPQC_DESCRIPTION# : ENDIF
: IF &VALUE# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_FIELD_NAMES#[&IDX#]=&VK# : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_FIELD_VALUES#[&IDX#]=&VALUE# : SET &IDX# = &IDX# + 1 : ENDIF
:ENDPROCESS
:CLOSE_PROCESS &HND#
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.HPQC_ARRAYS_TO_DEFECT_XML
